description: The Outstanding Undergraduate in Economics Scholarship is open to a declared Economics (Economics or Energy Economics) major with a minimum 3.5 cumulative GPA who has completed a minimum of 45 hours at the time of application. Eligibility Requirements Declared Economics (Economics or Energy Economics) major Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.5 or higher Completed a minimum of 45 hours

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Economics   or SIS_Major_2 is Economics-Energy Economics   or SIS_Major is Economics   or SIS_Major is Economics-Energy Economics   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Economics   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Economics-Energy Economics   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Economics   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Economics-Energy Economics
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Economics   or SIS_Major_2 is Economics-Energy Economics   or SIS_Major is Economics   or SIS_Major is Economics-Energy Economics   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Economics   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Economics-Energy Economics   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Economics   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Economics-Energy Economics

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
